titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4038) to require that supplemental certifications and background investigations be completed prior to the admission of certain aliens as refugees, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4038) to require that supplemental certifications and background investigations be completed prior to the admission of certain aliens as refugees, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-342, by Mr. Collins (GA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4038 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 75.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 531.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 243 - 182 (Roll no. 638).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 183 (Roll no. 639).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4038) to require that supplemental certifications and background investigations be completed prior to the admission of certain aliens as refugees.
